pullrequest.title: Fix compiler error due to specified float/double type instead of btScalar in BulletUniversalJoint.cc on Apple LLVM version 5.1 (clang-503.0.38) (based on LLVM 3.4svn)

content.raw: Also, would you be willing to sign our [Contributor Agreement](http://osrfoundation.org/caa.html)? There is more information on the link, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you have.
content.html: Also, would you be willing to sign our Contributor Agreement? There is more information on the link, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you have.
